columns.description: Unique identifier for the user. Used in Microsoft Graph API to reference user records. Synonyms: user key, user record id.
User's email address. Primary contact and login for Microsoft services. Synonyms: email, mail address, user email.
Full name displayed for the user. Used in user profiles and communications. Synonyms: name, user name, display name.
Department the user belongs to. Helps organize users by business unit in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: division, team, org unit.
Name of the user's manager. Used for reporting structure and approvals. Synonyms: supervisor, boss, reporting manager.
Type of user (e.g., employee, guest). Distinguishes internal and external users in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: user category, role, membership type.
Whether the account is enabled or not. Indicates if the user can access Microsoft services. Synonyms: active, enabled, account status.
Whether the user has a license assigned. Used to check service eligibility in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: licensed, has license, license status.
Whether Multi-Factor Authentication is disabled. Security setting for user authentication. Synonyms: MFA status, two-factor disabled.
Last time the user signed in. Used for activity tracking and auditing. Synonyms: last login, last access, sign-in time.
Last login to Exchange Online. Tracks email service usage. Synonyms: last email login, exchange login time.
Last login to Entra ID (Azure AD). Used for identity management and auditing. Synonyms: Azure AD login, Entra login time.
Total emails sent. Measures user communication activity. Synonyms: sent mail count, outgoing emails.
Total emails received. Measures inbound communication. Synonyms: received mail count, incoming emails.
Identifier for the tenant. Used to scope users and resources in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: organization id, tenant id.
Groups the user is a member of. Used for permissions and access control. Synonyms: group membership, user groups.
Versioning for concurrency control. Used to manage updates and prevent conflicts. Synonyms: record version, concurrency token.
Emails received in the last 180 days. Used for activity and compliance reporting. Synonyms: recent received emails, 6-month email count.
Emails received in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly received emails, 1-month email count.
Emails received in the last 7 days. Synonyms: weekly received emails, 1-week email count.
Emails received in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly received emails, 3-month email count.
Emails sent in the last 180 days. Synonyms: recent sent emails, 6-month sent mail.
Emails sent in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly sent emails, 1-month sent mail.
Emails sent in the last 7 days. Synonyms: weekly sent emails, 1-week sent mail.
Emails sent in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly sent emails, 3-month sent mail.
Licenses assigned to the user. Used for service eligibility and billing. Synonyms: user licenses, assigned licenses.
Custom attribute for extended metadata. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property.
Custom attribute for extended metadata. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property.
Custom attribute for extended metadata. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property.
Custom attribute for extended metadata. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property.

Custom attribute for extended metadata. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property.
Custom attribute for extended metadata. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property.
Custom attribute for extended metadata. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property.
Custom attribute for extended metadata. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property.
Name of the company the user belongs to. Used for organization context. Synonyms: organization name, business name.
Country of the user. Used for localization and compliance. Synonyms: user country, location.
Meetings created in the last 180 days. Tracks collaboration activity. Synonyms: recent meetings, 6-month meeting count.
Meetings created in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly meetings, 1-month meeting count.
Meetings created in the last 7 days. Synonyms: weekly meetings, 1-week meeting count.
Meetings created in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly meetings, 3-month meeting count.
Meetings interacted with in the last 180 days. Tracks user engagement. Synonyms: recent meeting interactions, 6-month engagement.
Meetings interacted with in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly meeting interactions, 1-month engagement.
Meetings interacted with in the last 7 days. Synonyms: weekly meeting interactions, 1-week engagement.
Meetings interacted with in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly meeting interactions, 3-month engagement.
Emails read in the last 180 days. Synonyms: recent read emails, 6-month read count.
Emails read in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly read emails, 1-month read count.
Emails read in the last 7 days. Synonyms: weekly read emails, 1-week read count.
Emails read in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly read emails, 3-month read count.
Last time the password was changed. Used for security and compliance. Synonyms: password change date, last password update.
URL to the user's profile photo. Used in user profiles and communications. Synonyms: profile image, avatar.
Date the user record was created. Used for auditing and lifecycle management. Synonyms: creation date, record start date.
Date the license was assigned. Used for tracking license lifecycle. Synonyms: license start date, assignment date.
Status of the account (active, inactive, disabled, unknown). Used for access control and reporting. Synonyms: account state, user status.
ISO country code. Used for localization and compliance. Synonyms: country code, location code.
City of last login. Used for location tracking and security. Synonyms: login city, access city.
Country of last login. Used for location tracking and security. Synonyms: login country, access country.
State of last login. Used for location tracking and security. Synonyms: login state, access state.
Mailbox quota warning threshold. Used for storage management. Synonyms: warning quota, mailbox threshold.
Current mailbox size. Used for storage management and reporting. Synonyms: mailbox size, storage used.
Quota after which sending is prohibited. Used for mailbox management. Synonyms: send quota, send limit.
Quota after which sending and receiving are prohibited. Used for mailbox management. Synonyms: send/receive quota, mailbox limit.
Whether the user has admin privileges. Used for access control and permissions. Synonyms: admin status, administrator.
Whether the user can use self-service password reset. Used for security and user empowerment. Synonyms: SSPR enabled, password reset capability.
Whether the user is managed on-premises. Used for hybrid environments. Synonyms: on-premises status, local user.
Whether the mailbox is shared. Used for collaboration and access control. Synonyms: shared mailbox, group mailbox.
Type of mailbox (user, shared). Used for mailbox management and reporting. Synonyms: mailbox type, mailbox category.
ID of the user's manager. Used for reporting structure and approvals. Synonyms: manager id, supervisor id.
User's login name (usually email format). Used for authentication and identification. Synonyms: principal name, login name, UPN.
Comma-separated list of Group IDs that the user belongs to. Used to track group memberships. Synonyms: group ids, group list, member groups.

search_text: Table: UserRecords. Columns: UserID: Unique identifier for the user. Used in Microsoft Graph API to reference user records. Synonyms: user key, user record id., Mail: User's email address. Primary contact and login for Microsoft services. Synonyms: email, mail address, user email., DisplayName: Full name displayed for the user. Used in user profiles and communications. Synonyms: name, user name, display name., Department: Department the user belongs to. Helps organize users by business unit in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: division, team, org unit., ManagerName: Name of the user's manager. Used for reporting structure and approvals. Synonyms: supervisor, boss, reporting manager., UserType: Type of user (e.g., employee, guest). Distinguishes internal and external users in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: user category, role, membership type., AccountEnabled: Whether the account is enabled or not. Indicates if the user can access Microsoft services. Synonyms: active, enabled, account status., IsLicensed: Whether the user has a license assigned. Used to check service eligibility in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: licensed, has license, license status., IsMFADisabled: Whether Multi-Factor Authentication is disabled. Security setting for user authentication. Synonyms: MFA status, two-factor disabled., LastSignInDateTime: Last time the user signed in. Used for activity tracking and auditing. Synonyms: last login, last access, sign-in time., LastExchangeOnlineLogin: Last login to Exchange Online. Tracks email service usage. Synonyms: last email login, exchange login time., LastEntraIdLogin: Last login to Entra ID (Azure AD). Used for identity management and auditing. Synonyms: Azure AD login, Entra login time., EmailSent: Total emails sent. Measures user communication activity. Synonyms: sent mail count, outgoing emails., EmailReceived: Total emails received. Measures inbound communication. Synonyms: received mail count, incoming emails., TenantCode: Identifier for the tenant. Used to scope users and resources in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: organization id, tenant id., MemberOf: Groups the user is a member of. Used for permissions and access control. Synonyms: group membership, user groups., RowVersion: Versioning for concurrency control. Used to manage updates and prevent conflicts. Synonyms: record version, concurrency token., EmailReceive_D180: Emails received in the last 180 days. Used for activity and compliance reporting. Synonyms: recent received emails, 6-month email count., EmailReceive_D30: Emails received in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly received emails, 1-month email count., EmailReceive_D7: Emails received in the last 7 days. Synonyms: weekly received emails, 1-week email count., EmailReceive_D90: Emails received in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly received emails, 3-month email count., EmailSent_D180: Emails sent in the last 180 days. Synonyms: weekly sent emails, 1-week sent mail., EmailSent_D90: Emails sent in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly sent emails, 3-month sent mail., Licenses: Licenses assigned to the user. Used for organization-specific data in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: custom field, extension property., CompanyName: Name of the company the user belongs to. Used for organization context. Synonyms: organization name, business name., Country: Country of the user. Used for localization and compliance. Synonyms: user country, location., Meeting_Created_Count_180: Meetings created in the last 180 days. Tracks collaboration activity. Synonyms: recent meetings, 6-month meeting count., Meeting_Created_Count_30: Meetings created in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly meetings, 1-month meeting count., Meeting_Created_Count_7: Meetings created in the last 7 days. Synonyms: weekly meetings, 1-week meeting count., Meeting_Created_Count_90: Meetings created in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly meetings, 3-month meeting count., Meeting_Interacted_Count_180: Meetings interacted with in the last 180 days. Tracks user engagement. Synonyms: recent meeting interactions, 6-month engagement., Meeting_Interacted_Count_30: Meetings interacted with in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly meeting interactions, 1-month engagement., Meeting_Interacted_Count_7: Meetings interacted with in the last 7 days. Synonyms: quarterly meeting interactions, 3-month engagement., Read_Count_180: Emails read in the last 180 days. Synonyms: recent read emails, 6-month read count., Read_Count_30: Emails read in the last 30 days. Synonyms: monthly read emails, 1-month read count., Read_Count_7: Emails read in the last 7 days. Synonyms: weekly read emails, 1-week read count., Read_Count_90: Emails read in the last 90 days. Synonyms: quarterly read emails, 3-month read count., LastPasswordChangeDateTime: Last time the password was changed. Used for security and compliance. Synonyms: password change date, last password update., PhotoUrl: URL to the user's profile photo. Used in user profiles and communications. Synonyms: profile image, avatar., CreateDate: Date the user record was created. Used for auditing and lifecycle management. Synonyms: creation date, record start date., LicenseAssignedDate: Date the license was assigned. Used for tracking license lifecycle. Synonyms: license start date, assignment date., AccountStatus: Status of the account (active, inactive, disabled, unknown). Used for access control and reporting. Synonyms: account state, user status., CountryCode: ISO country code. Used for localization and compliance. Synonyms: country code, location code., LastLogin_City: City of last login. Used for location tracking and security. Synonyms: login city, access city., LastLogin_Country: Country of last login. Used for location tracking and security. Synonyms: login country, access country., LastLogin_State: State of last login. Used for location tracking and security. Synonyms: login state, access state., IssueWarningQuotaMB: Mailbox quota warning threshold. Used for storage management. Synonyms: warning quota, mailbox threshold., MailBoxSizeInMB: Current mailbox size. Used for storage management and reporting. Synonyms: mailbox size, storage used., ProhibitSendQuotaMB: Quota after which sending is prohibited. Used for mailbox management. Synonyms: send quota, send limit., ProhibitSendReceiveQuotaMB: Quota after which sending and receiving are prohibited. Used for mailbox management. Synonyms: send/receive quota, mailbox limit., IsAdmin: Whether the user has admin privileges. Used for access control and permissions. Synonyms: admin status, administrator., IsSSPRCapable: Whether the user can use self-service password reset. Used for security and user empowerment. Synonyms: SSPR enabled, password reset capability., IsOnpremiseUser: Whether the user is managed on-premises. Used for hybrid environments. Synonyms: on-premises status, local user., IsSharedMailbox: Whether the mailbox is shared. Used for collaboration and access control. Synonyms: shared mailbox, group mailbox., MailBoxType: Type of mailbox (user, shared). Used for mailbox management and reporting. Synonyms: mailbox type, mailbox category., ManagerId: ID of the user's manager. Used for reporting structure and approvals. Synonyms: manager id, supervisor id., UserPrincipalName: User's login name (usually email format). Used for authentication and identification. Synonyms: principal name, login name, UPN., GroupIdsCsv: Comma-separated list of Group IDs that the user belongs to. Used to track group memberships. Synonyms: group ids, group list, member groups.

columns.description: Unique identifier for the license. Used to reference licenses in Microsoft Graph API queries. Synonyms: license key, license record id.
Name of the license or product. Identifies the specific license assigned to a user or tenant. Synonyms: product name, license name.
Actual monetary cost paid for this license. Tracks expenses and financials in Microsoft Graph API licensing. Synonyms: price, charge, expense.
Cost charged to or by a partner organization. Used for partner billing and reconciliation in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: reseller cost, external charge.
Number of units consumed under the license. Indicates usage and allocation in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: used units, allocation.
Current status of the license (e.g., active, expired, suspended). Used to filter licenses in Microsoft Graph API queries. Synonyms: state, activity, enabled.
Total units available in the license. Shows maximum allocation for a license in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: quota, available units.
Indicates if the license is a trial version. Used to distinguish trial and paid licenses in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: trial status, evaluation.
Indicates if the license has been paid for. Used for billing and financial tracking in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: payment status, paid license.
Date when the license expires. Used to manage license lifecycle and renewals in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: expiry date, end date.
Timestamp when the license record was created. Useful for auditing and tracking changes in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: creation date, record timestamp.
Indicates if the license is an add-on to another product. Used to manage bundled or supplementary licenses in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: add-on status, extension.

search_text: Table: Licenses. Columns: Id: Unique identifier for the license. Used to reference licenses in Microsoft Graph API queries. Synonyms: license key, license record id., Name: Name of the license or product. Identifies the specific license assigned to a user or tenant. Synonyms: product name, license name., ActualCost: Actual monetary cost paid for this license. Tracks expenses and financials in Microsoft Graph API licensing. Synonyms: price, charge, expense., PartnerCost: Cost charged to or by a partner organization. Used for partner billing and reconciliation in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: reseller cost, external charge., ConsumedUnits: Number of units consumed under the license. Indicates usage and allocation in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: used units, allocation., Status: Current status of the license (e.g., active, expired, suspended). Used to filter licenses in Microsoft Graph API queries. Synonyms: state, activity, enabled., TotalUnits: Total units available in the license. Shows maximum allocation for a license in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: quota, available units., IsTrial: Indicates if the license is a trial version. Used to distinguish trial and paid licenses in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: trial status, evaluation., IsPaid: Indicates if the license has been paid for. Used for billing and financial tracking in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: payment status, paid license., LicenceExpirationDate: Date when the license expires. Used to manage license lifecycle and renewals in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: expiry date, end date., CreateDateTime: Timestamp when the license record was created. Useful for auditing and tracking changes in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: creation date, record timestamp., IsAddOn: Indicates if the license is an add-on to another product. Used to manage bundled or supplementary licenses in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: add-on status, extension.

columns.description: Unique identifier for the group. Used in Microsoft Graph API to reference group objects. Synonyms: group id, group key, object id.
Identifier for the tenant. Used to scope groups and resources in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: organization id, tenant id.
Display name of the group. Shown in directory and used for identification. Synonyms: group name, name, title.
Description of the group's purpose. Provides context about the group in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: group description, about, details.
Email address of the group. Used for mail-enabled groups in Microsoft 365. Synonyms: group email, email address, mail address.
Whether the group is mail-enabled. Indicates if the group can receive emails. Synonyms: mail enabled, email enabled, has email.
Whether the group is security-enabled. Used for access control and permissions in Azure AD. Synonyms: security group, is security, access control.
Classification label for the group. Used for data governance and sensitivity labeling. Synonyms: sensitivity label, data classification, label.
Date and time when the group was created. Used for auditing and lifecycle management. Synonyms: creation date, created on, create time.
Application or user that created the group on behalf of another. Used for delegation tracking. Synonyms: created by, creator, on behalf of.
Types of the group (e.g., Unified for Microsoft 365 groups). Defines group behavior and features. Synonyms: group type, type, category.
List of group owners. Users with administrative rights over the group. Synonyms: group owners, administrators, admins.
Proxy email addresses for the group. Additional email aliases for the group. Synonyms: email aliases, alias addresses, smtp addresses.
Date and time when the group was last renewed. Used for group expiration policies. Synonyms: renewal date, last renewed, renewed on.
Resources provisioned for the group (e.g., Team). Indicates connected services. Synonyms: provisioning options, resources, connected services.
Visibility of the group (Public, Private, HiddenMembership). Controls discoverability. Synonyms: group visibility, access level, privacy.
Licenses assigned to the group. Used for group-based licensing in Azure AD. Synonyms: group licenses, license assignment, assigned licenses.
Date and time when the group expires. Used for group lifecycle management. Synonyms: expiry date, expires on, expiration date.
Date and time when the group was last modified. Used for change tracking. Synonyms: modified date, last updated, update time.
Whether the group is archived. Archived groups are read-only. Synonyms: archived status, is archived, archive state.
Whether management of the group is restricted. Limits who can modify the group. Synonyms: management restricted, restricted, locked.
Dynamic membership rule for the group. Defines criteria for automatic membership. Synonyms: membership criteria, dynamic rule, membership filter.
Total number of members in the group. Count of all group members. Synonyms: member count, total members, members.
Total number of owners of the group. Count of group administrators. Synonyms: owner count, total owners, admin count.
Associated Microsoft Teams team ID. Links the group to a Teams team. Synonyms: teams id, team identifier, associated team.
Web URL for the associated Microsoft Teams team. Direct link to the team. Synonyms: teams url, team link, teams web link.
Azure AD roles assigned to the group. Used for role-based access control. Synonyms: assigned roles, group roles, RBAC roles.
Type of membership (Assigned or Dynamic). Defines how members are added. Synonyms: membership type, member assignment, membership mode.

schema_info.description: Microsoft 365 Groups and Teams information table

search_text: Table: UserGroupInfos. Columns: Id: Unique identifier for the group. Used in Microsoft Graph API to reference group objects. Synonyms: group id, group key, object id., TenantCode: Identifier for the tenant. Used to scope groups and resources in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: organization id, tenant id., DisplayName: Display name of the group. Shown in directory and used for identification. Synonyms: group name, name, title., Description: Description of the group's purpose. Provides context about the group in Microsoft Graph API. Synonyms: group description, about, details., Mail: Email address of the group. Used for mail-enabled groups in Microsoft 365. Synonyms: group email, email address, mail address., MailEnabled: Whether the group is mail-enabled. Indicates if the group can receive emails. Synonyms: mail enabled, email enabled, has email., SecurityEnabled: Whether the group is security-enabled. Used for access control and permissions in Azure AD. Synonyms: security group, is security, access control., Classification: Classification label for the group. Used for data governance and sensitivity labeling. Synonyms: sensitivity label, data classification, label., CreatedDateTime: Date and time when the group was created. Used for auditing and lifecycle management. Synonyms: creation date, created on, create time., CreatedOnBehalfOf: Application or user that created the group on behalf of another. Used for delegation tracking. Synonyms: created by, creator, on behalf of., GroupTypes: Types of the group (e.g., Unified for Microsoft 365 groups). Defines group behavior and features. Synonyms: group type, type, category., Owners: List of group owners. Users with administrative rights over the group. Synonyms: group owners, administrators, admins., ProxyAddresses: Proxy email addresses for the group. Additional email aliases for the group. Synonyms: email aliases, alias addresses, smtp addresses., RenewedDateTime: Date and time when the group was last renewed. Used for group expiration policies. Synonyms: renewal date, last renewed, renewed on., ResourceProvisioningOptions: Resources provisioned for the group (e.g., Team). Indicates connected services. Synonyms: provisioning options, resources, connected services., Visibility: Visibility of the group (Public, Private, HiddenMembership). Controls discoverability. Synonyms: group visibility, access level, privacy., AssignedLicenses: Licenses assigned to the group. Used for group-based licensing in Azure AD. Synonyms: group licenses, license assignment, assigned licenses., ExpirationDateTime: Date and time when the group expires. Used for group lifecycle management. Synonyms: expiry date, expires on, expiration date., LastModifiedDate: Date and time when the group was last modified. Used for change tracking. Synonyms: modified date, last updated, update time., isArchived: Whether the group is archived. Archived groups are read-only. Synonyms: archived status, is archived, archive state., isManagementRestricted: Whether management of the group is restricted. Limits who can modify the group. Synonyms: management restricted, restricted, locked., membershipRule: Dynamic membership rule for the group. Defines criteria for automatic membership. Synonyms: membership criteria, dynamic rule, membership filter., MemberCount: Total number of members in the group. Count of all group members. Synonyms: member count, total members, members., OwnerCount: Total number of owners of the group. Count of group administrators. Synonyms: owner count, total owners, admin count., TeamId: Associated Microsoft Teams team ID. Links the group to a Teams team. Synonyms: teams id, team identifier, associated team., TeamWebUrl: Web URL for the associated Microsoft Teams team. Direct link to the team. Synonyms: teams url, team link, teams web link., RolesAssigned: Azure AD roles assigned to the group. Used for role-based access control. Synonyms: assigned roles, group roles, RBAC roles., MembershipType: Type of membership (Assigned or Dynamic). Defines how members are added. Synonyms: membership type, member assignment, membership mode.
